>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.hIhgdXnqGHBm0A64]{Envoy Improvisation}

@Icon[type:sense-dependent]

As a standard action, you can attempt an Intimidate check to @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.6fqgiVqlA7u9jS4i#demoralize]{Demoralize} a creature with the animal or vermin creature type within 60 feet of you. If you succeed, the target must also succeed at a Will saving throw (DC = 10 + 1/2 your envoy level + your Charisma modifier) or become @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.Item.DtwiUWi8dpzkq4tM]{Frightened} for 1 round or until it takes an action to move away from you. Once a creature has been affected by this ability, itâ€™s immune for 24 hours.

At 6th level, you can spend 1 Resolve Point to target multiple creatures with the animal or vermin creature type with this ability, up to a maximum number of creatures equal to half your envoy level ([[floor(@classes.envoy.levels/2)]]). Attempt one Intimidate check against all your selected targets. The DC of the check is equal to the highest DC to demoralize any one of the foes, plus 1 for each additional target beyond the first.
